ok do i get a comment once in a while whats a guy gotta do to get a comment around here...jeeez on a happier not me and tyl went on a run the I went swimming he didnt cold...a bit we gonna do it again anybody else who lives near the lake wanna come just talk to us yeah or we biking sometime i got to get a bigger helmet yeah sooo ummm what else its so cool that erikas home i bet shes happy rook

maaan u guys want me to talk well since this is a place to talk kay i got food poisoning on sunday this sucks yah things u shouldnt know unless u asked for em right mmhmm damn right yah i got halo and it is fun i also got a new jump drive which is twice the size stick as luke lol baaad joke running joke too yah hmmm so trade swords for axes luke? maybe make a double bladed axe sometime? haha maybe later rook

jsut had a party and the next morning i wake up energized to go running which i do and work out for an hour afterward dude jsut hit me then this morning sucked i woke up and said shit because i was so sore thas me oh well ah so kit its your turn for a party and then its mine later yall god i hate it when i say that
well people suck yea rook

well seems to me that i got ditched nobody calls or talks to me...this sucks im home alone and bored as hell oh well on a more positive note crew starts august 12!!! and im goin to orlando on july 23 annnnnnd boredom creates some wierd thoughts get me outa here rook

scared now? should be! lol!!! im not sad like that anymore im gonna kill the bastage that insulted my sister so i forgot what all it was that i was mad about...woot for anger eh? anyway from previous blog entries you should know that i love history-that and going down in flames...glorious! yeah so i like sparta...they got cajones ill give them that...custer was just dumb...lol! well we all are in some point eh? yes i am insane...but i am happy with that fact so deal with it lol! went and saw avp yesterday...twas fun...went with luke and had a blast...flying predators with uber spears and acidic blood with the aliens was cool...we laughed much twas fun twas fun anyway...crew starts the 30th...school starts tomorow..CAN ANYBODY SAY JUST F*** IT? 1.antidisestablishmentarianism:the thoughts and actions of those against those againts the civilized world this has been the dictionary according to rook

thermopolae...the gate way to greece... 300 spartans...vs...250,000 persian light infantry spartans first...covered in thick bronze armor...heavy spears...short swords call zephas...huge sheilds of oak covered in 1 inch of bronze armor ...across a hundred foot gap in a mountain...4 deep... persian light infantry...lots of em...short spears made of some weak wood...wicker-work sheild..no armor...no swords...well the persian imortals had swords...but theres only 10,000 of them... who won in terms of ground lost?...persians... who won in terms of body count?...sparta...300-15,234 persian dead including more than 3 quarters of the imortals...xerxes personal gaurd slaughtered damn...just thought u guys might like that

ok so im watching custers last stand on the history channel right? and the indian tribes are getting together and are gonna beat the crap outa the 7th cav and they start smoking a peace pipe so im wondering whats in a peace pipe that makes it so peacefull? i dunno whatever it is it worked weird thing is the indians used winchester m.1873s against em- they are repeaters...the 7th cav had spencers or sharps or springfeilds...one shots...not cool they didnt have a chance lol no chance whatsoever and whats confusing is the fact that the 7th shot their horses when they got sorrounded whats the point of that... they cant run now the indians are on horses shooting the shit outa them...its so gay... and custer was such a smart dude too tho...34 out of 34th in west point not so spiffy...he got to be a brigader general at 23..some kinda record...he just kinda fucked up i guess...i think theyre saying his sub commanders dumped him...and he was alone with 200 someodd men...againts 400 i think...and about 4000 were 15 miles away...close enough to help jeez dontcha just hate when people ditch u? i do... rook

i hate it when this happens...im through helping people it all come to naught...fuckit im just not gonna do it... ineedahug122: you know as well as i do that thats a lie and you are still going to be trying to help her as best as you can yeah i kno...i kno... thanks for listening such as it is...i am the kinda guy who will lose sleep helping people yeah i kno its not good for me but i do it and its my biggest fault...shit fuckit jsut fuckit this is rook...signing off...for a while...bbl
